title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes the criticisms directed at Draymond Green for hosting a podcast during the NBA Finals is ridiculous and has had no impact on the outcomes of the games thus far. He shares a surprising and unexpected candidate for MVP of the Finals. He also tells you which team he expects to make a shocking run to the Super Bowl this season similar to last year's Bengals. Plus, 3-time NBA Champion Shaun Livingston joins the show to give his thoughts on the Draymond Green situation and what it is like to battle back from significant injuries similar to Klay Thompson. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
